wikipedia_page.main: Howard King (born 1 September 1946) is a former football referee in the English Football League and Premier League. He also served on the Welsh FIFA List. He was based in Merthyr Tydfil which was also home to Leo Callaghan, one of only three Welsh referees to control the English FA Cup Final.

response: *Howard King (public-address announcer) (1932–2016), public-address announcer for the Michigan Wolverines football team
*Howard King (Jurassic Park), fictional character from Jurassic Park
*Howard King (boxer), American boxer active in 1950s and 60s
